author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Euro Ceramics: Outcome of board meeting
description: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Tuesday, May 30, 2017 Appointed Mr. Gautam Suryaprasad Pandit, as an Additional (Independent) Director of the Company.
articleBody: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Tuesday, May 30, 2017 Appointed Mr. Gautam Suryaprasad Pandit, as an Additional (Independent) Director of the Company for a period of five years with effect from May 30, 2017, subject to approval of members in the General Meeting of the CompanySource : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Euro Ceramics board meeting on March 30, 2017
description: We wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday, May 30, 2017.
articleBody: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday, May 30, 2017 inter-alia to consider and approve the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2017.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Euro Ceramics independent director Mukund M. Modi passes away
description: We hereby inform you that Mr. Mukund Manubhai Modi, Independent Director of the Company passed away on Saturday, 25th March, 2017.
articleBody: With reference to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that Mr. Mukund Manubhai Modi, Independent Director of the Company passed away on Saturday, 25th March, 2017.     The Company places on record the valuable contribution and guidance provided by Late Mukund Manubhai Modi during his tenure as an Independent Director of the Company.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Euro Ceramics

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Euro Ceramics appoints Usha Jaysheel Kotian as additional independent director
description: Euro Ceramics at its meeting held on March 28, 2015, has appointed Ms. Usha Jaysheel Kotian as an Additional Independent Director (Woman Director) of the Company for a period 5 years with effect from March 28, 2015 till March 27, 2020; subject to approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.
articleBody: Euro Ceramics Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on March 28, 2015, has appointed Ms. Usha Jaysheel Kotian as an Additional Independent Director (Woman Director) of the Company for a period 5 years with effect from March 28, 2015 till March 27, 2020; subject to approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Euro Ceramics

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Euro Ceramics' outcome of board meeting
description: Euro Ceramics at its meeting held on February 06, 2014, has issued and allotted 51,59,705 Equity Shares of Rs. 10/- each upon conversion of 51,59,705 Compulsory Convertible Debentures at a price of Rs. 24.42 per share. (including premium of Rs. 14.42 per share), which were issued as per the terms of Letter of Approval issued by Corporate Debt.
articleBody: Euro Ceramics Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 06, 2014, inter alia, has issued and allotted 51,59,705 Equity Shares of Rs. 10/- each upon conversion of 51,59,705 Compulsory Convertible Debentures at a price of Rs. 24.42 per share (including premium of Rs. 14.42 per share), which were issued as per the terms of Letter of Approval (LOA) issued by Corporate Debt Restructuring (CDR) cell, on August 08, 2012 on preferential basis.Accordingly, the Paid up share capital of the Company is increased from Rs. 28,57,80,120 divided into 28578012 Equity Shares of Rs. 10/- each to Rs. 33,73,77,170 divided into 33737717 Equity Shares of Rs. 10/- each.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Euro Ceramics

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Euro Ceramics re-appointed Talakshi Nandu as Whole-time Director
description: Reappointed Mr. Talakshi Nandu, as Whole-time Director of the Company, for a further period of five years w.e.f. April 01, 2013, subject to the approval of the shareholders of Euro Ceramics.
articleBody: Euro Ceramics Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 11, 2013, inter alia, has resolved the following :1. Reappointed Mr. Talakshi Nandu, as Whole-time Director of the Company, for a further period of five years w.e.f. April 01, 2013, subject to the approval of the shareholders of the Company;2. Reappointed Mr. Kumar Shah, as Whole-time Director of the Company, for a further period of five years w.e.f. April 01, 2013, subject to the approval of the shareholders of the Company;3. Reappointed Mr. Paresh Shah as Whole-time Director of the Company, for a further period of five years w.e.f. April 01, 2013, subject to the approval of the shareholders of the Company.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Euro Ceramics

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Manish Ghia appoints as Practicing Company Secretary of Euro Ceramics
description: Manish Ghia appoints as Practicing Company Secretary of Euro Ceramics
articleBody: Euro Ceramics Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on November 30, 2012, inter alia, have:1. Considered and approved the proposal of sale or otherwise disposal of surplus land of the Company, subject to the approval of the members of the Company under Section 293(1)(a) of the Companies Act, 1956 and such other approvals as may be required;2. Decided to take the approval of members for above matter through Postal Ballot process and appointed Mr. Manish L. Ghia, Practicing Company Secretary, Mumbai as scrutinizer to conduct the postal ballot process in fair and transparent manner.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Euro Ceramics
